title: Google pixel 2 not merging calls on conference calls.
content:
When trying to connect second call to first with merge button, it seems to lose first call and replace it with a recorded message to "please put in a password". 
The first call is lost and recorded message plays over and over second caller and myself.
This has gone on for sometime now and was hoping a fix would have happened by now but still doing this problem. Any help on this issue coming soon?
